title: The Porsche 911 GT3 Gets a Wild New Manthey Kit and It’s Faster Than Ever
description: When it comes to performance, most brands like Porsche have their own internal capabilities; they are, after all, a sports car company. However, there are exceptions. Manthey Racing was born in the confines of the racetrack, becoming a legendary team that started tinkering with Porsches back in ...
titleSummary: "Manthey's Magic Touch Boosts Porsche 911 GT3 to Unprecedented Speed Heights"
descriptionSummary: Few companies can rival Porsche's in-house performance prowess, but one notable exception is Manthey Racing, a storied team forged on the track and renowned for its innovative work with Porsches dating back to the early days of motorsport.

title: Waymo Robotaxis Are Coming to Five More Cities—And Your Second Car Might Be in Trouble
description: Waymo robotaxis just circled five more spots on the map, and they might be your streets. The company says its fully autonomous cars are now running in Miami and will switch on in Dallas, Houston, San Antonio, and Orlando over the next few weeks, with paying riders coming in 2026. That comes ...
titleSummary: "Autonomous Rides Roll Out in 5 New Cities, Leaving Spare Cars in the Dust"
descriptionSummary: Waymo's self-driving taxis are expanding to new cities, including Miami, where they're already operating, and four other major Texas and Florida hubs: Dallas, Houston, San Antonio, and Orlando, set to debut later this year and start carrying fare-paying passengers in 2026.

title: Porsche Just Turned an Old Cayenne Into a One-Off Desert Runner
description: Porsche's Sonderwunsch program is usually associated with rare machinery and deep pockets, a place where the brand can create one-off builds for buyers who want something more personal than what the standard options sheet can offer. That extends to the Factory Re-Commission side of the program, ...
titleSummary: Porsche Unleashes Sand-Slaying Beast: A Customized Off-Road Cayenne Reborn
descriptionSummary: Porsche's bespoke Sonderwunsch service typically caters to discerning clients seeking unique creations that go beyond standard models, allowing them to commission one-off builds with customized features tailored to their individual tastes and preferences.

title: Mazda Reveals What Went Wrong With Its New Large SUVs
description: The CX-60 was the opening act for Mazda's new Large Product Group, the platform meant to push the brand more upmarket with longitudinal engines, rear-drive proportions, and plug-in hybrid options. On paper, the package was promising: a 2.5-liter four-cylinder paired with a 129 kW motor, a 17.8 kWh ...
titleSummary: Mazda's Latest Big Bet Falls Short in Crucial Quality Tests
descriptionSummary: Mazda's Large Product Group debutante, the CX-60, marked a significant upscale shift for the brand, featuring longitudinal engines, rear-wheel drive design, and PHEV capabilities in a compelling package with a 2.5L engine paired with an electric motor.

title: Hyundai Drops Bargain 2026 Kona Lease Deals For November
description: Hyundai sells one of the cheapest crossovers in America, which is the Venue. For some, though, the Venue’s petite size and pedestrian powertrain are just too difficult to live with, and that’s where the Kona comes in. While still costing way under $30,000, the Kona is a much more stylish, ...
titleSummary: "Hyundai Brings Back Limited-Time Savings on 2026 Kona Leases This Month Only"
descriptionSummary: The Hyundai Venue offers an affordable entry into the crossover market, but for those seeking more substance, the Kona presents a compelling alternative. This stylish subcompact SUV delivers style and capability without breaking the bank.

title: Ultra-Rare 2010 Bugatti Veyron Nocturne With 2,612 Miles Hits the Market
description: One car is single-handedly credited with creating what we call the "hypercar" segment. The Bugatti Veyron was born as a showcase of what "pushing the envelope" meant when it came to capability – a 2-door coupe that had a top speed of 250 mph, thanks to a 1,000 hp motor, but would do so while ...
titleSummary: "One of One: Rare 2010 Bugatti Veyron Nocturne Arrives for Sale"
descriptionSummary: The Bugatti Veyron is often hailed as the pioneer of hypercars. This sleek two-seater's record-shattering capabilities - including a top speed of 250mph and a 1,000hp engine - redefined what was thought possible in high-performance vehicles.

title: Infiniti Eyes “True Performance” Cars That Rival BMW M and Mercedes-AMG
description: Over its three-decade history, Nissan's luxury arm, Infiniti, has been known by fans and enthusiasts alike for releasing some subtly sporty models, including the Z-derived G35 and G37 coupes and sedans, as well as the FX-series of crossover SUVs. Although the Infiniti brand has spent the last few ...
titleSummary: Infiniti Aims to Muscle Up with High-Performance Models That Take on Posh Rivals
descriptionSummary: Infiniti, Nissan's luxury subsidiary, has long delighted driving enthusiasts with its understated yet performance-oriented vehicles, such as the Z-inspired G35 and G37 coupes and sedans, and the FX-series of crossover SUVs.

title: The Genesis G90 Wingback is a Full-Sized Wagon No One Saw Coming
description: We're trying to think which car was the last true full-sized station wagon ever made. Our best answer is the Chevrolet Caprice Wagon and Buick Roadmaster Estate, and those were last sold in 1996. For nearly 30 years, no one has really made big wagons, and luxury automakers don't really make ...

descriptionSummary: The era of full-sized station wagons appears to have ended with the Chevrolet Caprice Wagon and Buick Roadmaster Estate, which ceased production in 1996 after a nearly three-decade run without a comparable replacement.

description: This here is the upcoming Kia Sorento, at least that’s what NYMammoth’s latest rendering tells us. Although there’s no official news about the latest Sorento, possibilities—more like rumors—hint at an all-new generation slated for 2027. The 2026 Sorento is pretty much a carry-over model, with a few ...

descriptionSummary: Get a first look at what's to come from Kia, as NYMammoth's latest rendering teases the next-generation Sorento, rumored for a 2027 debut. The current model remains largely unchanged for 2026, awaiting a significant redesign.

description: Dodge made just one factory-painted pink supercar, and it can be yours. This 2015 Dodge Viper GTC is stirring up attention as it enters the final stretch of its online auction on duPont Registry. Bidding currently sits at $125,000 with less than four days left, and while plenty of fifth-gen Vipers ...

title: Kia Drops Stunning 2026 Sportage Lease Deals For November
description: In the busy compact crossover segment, the Toyota RAV4 and Honda CR-V lead the way on the sales charts, but there are flashier rivals if you’re not loyal to one of the Japanese brands. title: Mazda Surprises Everyone With a Fresh 2026 Update for the Mazda2
description: The Mazda2 has been gone from the US for more than a decade now, slipping out just as the then-new generation arrived globally. That generation is still the one on sale today. Before the company unified its naming, the model lived its early life in Japan as the Demio, and the third iteration has ...
titleSummary: "Mazda Shocks Fans with a Revamped 2026 Lineup for Its Pocket-Sized Icon"
descriptionSummary: The Mazda2 has been absent from US showrooms for over a decade, its American departure coinciding with the global debut of a new generation still sold here today.

title: $20.6M Gordon Murray S1 LM Becomes the Most Expensive New Car Ever Sold at Auction

His journey began as an engineer and designer of F1 cars back in the late '60s for Brabham (where his car won multiple championships), and eventually led him to McLaren, where ...

descriptionSummary: Gordon Murray's impact on motorsports and supercars is unparalleled. He started as a pioneering F1 engineer and designer at Brabham in the late 1960s, later joining forces with McLaren and making a lasting mark on the sport.

description: Kia has finally confirmed pricing for the new K4 Hatchback, and the numbers are the headline. descriptionSummary: Kia has unveiled pricing for its highly anticipated K4 Hatchback, with a starting point of $24,890 that positions it as one of the most budget-friendly options in the compact hatch segment.

title: The Real Reason Dealers Talk You Out of EVs
description: EV maintenance costs are not the problem for you. They’re a problem for your dealer. New-car margins are thin, so the real money comes from the “fixed ops” side of the house — parts and service — where gross margins often live in the 45–55% range, far higher than new-vehicle sales. When you pay for ...
titleSummary: Dealers' Dirty Secret: Why They Might Be Steering You Away from Electric Vehicles
descriptionSummary: Dealers' profit margins on new cars are slim, but lucrative revenue streams come from maintenance and repair services, which typically boast significantly higher profit margins of 45-55%.

title: Genesis Magma GT Concept Offers a Striking New Take on the Porsche 911 Formula

titleSummary: "Porsche's Bold Future Unveiled: Genesis Magma GT Concept Rethinks Timeless Sports Car Design"

But this 1985 Nissan 300ZX 2+2, showing over 67,000 miles, appears to be one of those rare survivors. The current seller says it’s finally time to let it go, despite Mrs. ...

descriptionSummary: A low-mileage, meticulously maintained 1985 Nissan 300ZX 2+2 has come onto the market, boasting an incredibly low 67,000 miles and a pristine condition that's a rare find in its era.

title: It's a Shame That America Never Got this Toyota Camry Wagon
description: Zoomers and younger millennials will probably be surprised at the fact that the Toyota Camry was once offered as a station wagon. The first generation offered a liftback option halfway between a sedan and a wagon, but the real long-roof version came in the second generation. The first Camry wagon ...
titleSummary: "America Misses Out on the Ultimate Utility Vehicle: Toyota's Forgotten Camry Wagon"
descriptionSummary: For many Gen Z-ers and younger millennials, it may come as a shock that the Toyota Camry was once available as a station wagon. The second-gen model brought the real deal, after an earlier liftback option.

title: Kia Drops Killer 2026 Sorento Lease Deals For November
description: If you need a three-row crossover that’s high on value, the Kia Sorento is one of the most affordable options. titleSummary: Kia Unveils Limited-Time 2026 Sorento Lease Offers to Kick Off Autumn
descriptionSummary: The Kia Sorento offers a winning combination of affordability, style, and versatility, making it a top choice for three-row crossover shoppers. Its sleek design shines in the updated 2024 model, while eco-friendly options abound, including hybrid and plug-in hybrid powertrains.

This comes as part of GM China’s Advanced Design team, which recently revealed ...

descriptionSummary: In China, Buick's designers have unveiled an exciting new concept, billed as a high-end vehicle that balances fun with family-friendly features. The project, spearheaded by Sangmin Kim, is a key innovation from GM's local Advanced Design team.

title: Inside the Texas Facility That Rebuilds the U.S. Military’s Humvees
description: Humvees, officially known as HMMWVs (High Mobility Multi-Purpose Wheeled Vehicles), are rugged military machines built to handle a wide range of combat roles. Although these are being slowly phased out for newer, more advanced JLTVs (Joint Light Tactical Vehicles), Humvees still play an integral ...
titleSummary: "Where War-Torn Humvees Come to Get Back on Wheels Again in Texas"
descriptionSummary: Rugged and versatile, High Mobility Multipurpose Wheeled Vehicles have long served as trusted workhorses in military operations, tackling a variety of combat roles despite being gradually replaced by the Joint Light Tactical Vehicle.

title: Fiat 500 Hybrid Makes the Nissan Kicks Look Like a Rocket
description: The Fiat 500 Hybrid is officially back in the brand’s lineup, and production has already started at the Mirafiori plant in Turin. Offered in Hatchback, 3+1, and Cabrio body styles, it arrives in Pop, Icon, and La Prima trims, plus the Torino launch edition that nods to the model’s birthplace. ...
titleSummary: Hybrid Hot Seat: Fiat 500 Leaves Nissan Kicks in Dust

It comes in three bodystyles - hatchback, coupe-like 3+1, and convertible cabriolet - in four distinct trim levels: Pop, Icon, La Prima, and a special Torino launch edition that pays homage to its Italian heritage.

title: Ford Still Makes a Sedan — And There's No Chance of It Coming to the US
description: We get it – crossovers, SUVs, and pickups sell, and sedans, hatchbacks, and wagons aren't as profitable anymore. Ford took that to heart in 2018 by saying it would be axing its lower-riding vehicles that aren't badged as Mustangs. We can only imagine the riot if Ford even hinted at killing off ...
titleSummary: "Ford's Only Remaining Rear-Wheel Drive Beauty Heads Abroad, Not Stateside"
descriptionSummary: As sales of crossovers, SUVs, and pickups continue to soar, many automakers are rethinking their sedans, hatchbacks, and wagons. Ford's 2018 pivot marked a turning point, with lower-riding models meeting the axe. The backlash against such a move would likely be fierce.

title: Nissan Pathfinder Could Return to Its Roots as a Body-on-Frame SUV
description: The Nissan Pathfinder has never stayed in one lane for long. Its earliest versions were unapologetically truck-like, built on the same bones as Nissan's Hardbody pickup and aimed squarely at drivers who actually needed ground clearance and a proper frame. That formula carried the model through much ...
titleSummary: "Nissan's Off-Road Heritage Revival: A Possible Return to Body-On-Frame Excellence"
descriptionSummary: From rugged off-road rigs to sleek family haulers, the Nissan Pathfinder has consistently defied categorization throughout its history, evolving from a utilitarian truck-based design to a more refined, versatile vehicle.

title: Software Error Triggers Recall of Nearly 230,000 Ford Bronco SUVs
description: Although the Bronco and Bronco Sport are incredibly successful models in Ford’s lineup, they are not without their problems. While one-off software glitches are fairly common these days, Blue Oval’s latest recall addresses something far more widespread. 229,609 vehicles, including 101,002 examples ...
titleSummary: Ford Recalls Thousands of Broncos Amid Glitch That Imperils Vehicle Safety.
descriptionSummary: Ford's highly popular Bronco and Bronco Sport have experienced issues beyond minor software hiccups, prompting a large-scale recall that affects nearly a quarter million units, with over 100,000 of those being the sport variant.

description: The Xterra was once Nissan's straight-cut rival to the Toyota 4Runner – compact enough to maneuver, rugged enough for trails, and stripped of anything unnecessary. It survived for two generations until its eventual discontinuation in 2015. However, it's become increasingly clear Nissan intends to ...
titleSummary: "Nissan's Revamped Xterra Packs a Punch in an Affordable Package"
descriptionSummary: Nissan's Xterra was a trailblazing SUV that effortlessly balanced agility with off-road prowess, jettisoning frills for functional simplicity. After a successful run spanning two generations, it ceased production in 2015. Recent hints suggest its spirit may live on.

title: These Luxury Brands Came Out On Top Of Sales Satisfaction
description: Every year, J.D. Power sends out tens of thousands of surveys to people who buy or lease a new car. Questions focus on the delivery process and dealership particulars, like sales staff and website interactions. Near the end of the year, J.D. Power then assembles a list of the automakers that top ...
titleSummary: High-End Favorites Dominate Consumer Reports of Customer Satisfaction Surveys
descriptionSummary: J.D. Power conducts an annual survey of thousands of new vehicle owners, gathering feedback on purchase experiences including dealership interactions, website engagement, and delivery processes. The resulting rankings highlight the top-performing automakers.

descriptionSummary: The Genesis G70 has been on the market for over five years, initially targeting the likes of BMW's 3 Series and Lexus' IS with its 2018 US debut. Now, at an age where many rivals have evolved, it remains a steady seller.

descriptionSummary: A devastating four-alarm fire erupted at the Novelis aluminum plant in Scriba, New York on Thursday morning, adding to the facility's recent string of incidents and further straining Ford's already precarious supply chain operations.

descriptionSummary: A rare 1989 Lamborghini Countach 25th Anniversary edition has landed on Bring a Trailer with a starting bid of $375,000. This highly sought-after Euro-market model boasts a stunning Rosso Siviglia exterior and Panna leather interior.

descriptionSummary: Inspired by the ethereal beauty of the Northern Lights, Lincoln's new Aurora package brings a captivating, shifting palette to its exclusive Black Label lineup. This unique theme is available on select Navigator, Nautilus, and Aviator models.

title: Uruguay Switched to EVs When Gas Hit $7, Would Americans Do the Same?

Gasoline now costs around $7.40 per gallon at the pump, making it one of the most expensive places in the world to ...
titleSummary: Uruguay's Electric Vehicle Shift: Can Rising Fuel Prices Trigger a US Revolution?
descriptionSummary: Uruguay has emerged as a surprising leader in electric vehicle adoption, with nearly a quarter of new car sales going to EVs - more than double last year's figure. Gas prices have skyrocketed, hitting over $7 per gallon locally.

title: 2027 Chevy Bolt With Super Cruise Hands-Free System Isn’t So Cheap Anymore

titleSummary: "Bolt Prices Surge: GM Tacks on Cost for Chevy's High-Tech Ride"

description: Kia has recalled 250,547 sedans for a rather concerning issue that could result in a melting, leaking gas tank, creating a fire risk. The issue relates specifically to the K5 midsize sedan, one of the sportier offerings in the segment. This is not the only fire-related hazard for Kia this year, as ...

title: Jeep’s New Military-Inspired Gladiator Goes to War With Tacoma
description: It’s been rather troubling times for Jeep’s midsize pickup, the Gladiator. Despite significant discounts, sales have declined over the last two or so years, while the planned Gladiator hybrid was scrapped before it even reached the market.  But Jeep is forging ahead with a few improvements to ...

descriptionSummary: Jeep's midsize pickup, the Gladiator, has faced a rough patch in recent years. New upgrades are now on the horizon for the struggling truck.

title: 2026 Audi Q3 Arrives $4,000 Pricier—Should You Get a 2025 Model Instead?
description: Audi already revealed the new-generation Q3 in Europe earlier this year, signaling a shift in styling, tech, and performance for its smallest SUV. The U.S. version now arrives for the 2026 model year, and it carries nearly all the same upgrades. The catch is simple: it's pricier. The outgoing 2025 ...

descriptionSummary: The latest Audi Q3 has been unveiled in Europe with a bold new design, cutting-edge technology, and enhanced performance capabilities. As it makes its US debut for the 2026 model year, enthusiasts can expect a price tag to match its upgraded features.

title: Volkswagen Restores Miracle T2 Bus That Survived California Wildfires
description: The Palisades fire that ripped through Los Angeles earlier this year was one of the most destructive in history, as thousands of homes were destroyed. titleSummary: "California's Lucky T2 Bus Emerges from Inferno with Thanks to VW Crew"
